ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: 5th Floor West, Ralli Quays, 3 Stanley Street

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Government Hub Programme is driving a radical reshaping of the Civil Service office estate. It will reduce the Government office estate from around 800 buildings to around 200 by 2023, comprising of around 18 to 22 strategic hubs across the UK, located in major city center conurbations.

HMRC's Regional Centres are a major component of the Government Hubs Programme. The HMRC Building Our Future Location (BOFL) Programme will see the current landscape of 170 HMRC offices reoriented into 13 modern Regional Centres, equipped with the digital infrastructure and training facilities needed to make HMRC a more highly skilled organization.
The authority is looking to select contractors with the capability and capacity to deliver a hub in Belfast providing a presence in Northern Ireland.
Initially, the Authority seeks market engagement and intends to host a supplier day with a date to be confirmed in Belfast. Full details can be obtained from the HMRC contract named in this notice.
Fit Out of HMRC Belfast, CAT B fit-out works of Levels Basement - Level 07 of Erskine House including M&E services.
An option of External Works scope may be required (to be confirmed by HMRC).

INFO_ADD.P: To register for the event you need to register on the HMRC SAP Ariba eSourcing Portal. Further Guidance for registering on the system can be found at https://www.gov.uk.
Once you have registered on HMRC SAP Ariba and obtained an ‘Account ID’ please contact craig.procter@hmrc.gsi.gov.uk to invite you to the event.

— in responding to this notice and expressing an interest in attending the supplier day you will be bound by a confidentiality agreement relating to all documents, data, and information provided by the Authority to contractors to inform by Supplier Day.
— this undertaking shall not apply to any document, information or data that is already or entered into the public domain by the authority enter prior to or during the course of this procurement.
